channel.title: Clan chat Redstone?
channel.description:
Every time i click on Clan chat the ignores Redstone gets activated like this:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2lxxpgh.jpg[/img]
How i fix it? (Using bluurs client).

item.title: Clan chat Redstone?
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

It’s probably because you don’t have a clan-chat red-stone so it just uses ignore list as a red-stone. Maybe it’s because your clan-chat tab is messed up, but probably not. All you need to do is get a clan-chat red-stone; they are very easy to get. I made summoning sprite and red-stone easily. Also if you are working on a project with a-lot of people shouldn’t you be able to figure this out on your own? No offense but the biggest part of any coding is knowing how to confront/solve problems.

In short, make a clan-chat red-stone.

I’ll give you a tip for an easy way to do it if you PM me.

Read full topic
